name: Clicker Heroes 2
summary:
Choose your favorite hero and embark on a never-ending glorious journey to the top right of your screen.

Kill monsters. Get gold. Choose your gear. Upgrade your gear. Learn talents. Defeat horrifying bosses. Progress to new worlds. Gain XP. Level up with a massive skill tree.

Or just sit there and do nothing, your hero will do most of it for you.

1.52e394+ hours of gameplay. Add Clicker Heroes 2 to your wishlist now!
